constants.description: Used for filtering the role of a user
constants.name: Tier1

decisions.name: Does_Channel_Opp_with_Matching_Partner_Exist
decisions.label: Does Channel Opp with Matching Partner Exist?

decisions.name: External_ID_On_Lead_Not_app
decisions.label: External ID On Lead, Not app

Flow.description: AAA 4/1/22 - Adding lead scoring 3/31/22 - Fixed an issue with creating new traditional inquiries. AAA 3/29/22 - Added changes for Bridge source AP 3/28/22- Tried to shut off auto-convert AAA 3/12/22 - Adding back in application name character limit, which was lost to deployment issues 3/2/22 - Added in further changes lost to deployment issues TEH 3/1/2022 - merged changes due to deployment issues. Route new applications to the matching contact or lead and run the auto-qualification process

formulas.description: True if Application Date = Jan 1st through Jun 14th
formulas.name: AppDateIsJan1toJun14

formulas.description: True if Application Date = Nov 1st through Dec 31st
formulas.name: AppDateIsNov11toDec31
AppNamingConvention

formulas.description: True if Standardized GPA >= 2.0 & Standardized GPA <= 2.5
formulas.name: GPANeedsApproval
PersonaFormula
formulas.expression: if( ispickval( {!Get_App.Country__c} , "United States" ), "US High School Student", "International High School Student" )

formulas.name: SourceScoreFormula
formulas.expression: IF( OR( TEXT( {!Get_App.Referral_Source__c} ) = "A Verto Representative Visited My School", TEXT( {!Get_App.Referral_Source__c} ) = "Family or Friend", TEXT( {!Get_App.Referral_Source__c} ) = "My High School Counselor", TEXT( {!Get_App.Referral_Source__c} ) = "Independent Educational Consultant", TEXT( {!Get_App.Referral_Source__c} ) = "My College" ), 5, 0 )

formulas.name: TraditionalLeadSourceFormula
formulas.expression: IF( OR( {!Get_App.UTM_Source__c} = "kipp", {!Get_App.UTM_Source_Last_Touch__c} = "kipp" ), "KIPP", IF( OR( {!Get_App.UTM_Source__c} = "bridge", {!Get_App.UTM_Source_Last_Touch__c} = "bridge" ), "Bridge", IF( !ISBLANK( {!Get_App.Source__c} ), {!Get_App.Source__c}, IF( ( ISBLANK({!Get_App.Source__c} ) && !ISBLANK( {!Get_App.UTM_Source_First_Touch_Category__c}) ), {!Get_App.UTM_Source_First_Touch_Category__c}, IF( ( ISBLANK( {!Get_App.Source__c} ) && ISBLANK( {!Get_App.UTM_Source_First_Touch_Category__c} ) && !ISBLANK( TEXT({!Get_App.Referral_Source__c} )) ), TEXT({!Get_App.Referral_Source__c}), "Website" ) ) ) ) )

formulas.name: TraditionalSourceFormula
formulas.expression: IF( OR( {!Get_App.UTM_Source__c} = "kipp", {!Get_App.UTM_Source_Last_Touch__c} = "kipp" ), "KIPP", IF( !ISBLANK({!Get_App.Source__c}), {!Get_App.Source__c}, IF( {!Get_App.UTM_Source_Last_Touch__c} = "bridge", {!GetUniversityAccount.Name}, IF( ( ISBLANK({!Get_App.Source__c} ) && !ISBLANK( {!Get_App.UTM_Source_First_Touch_Category__c}) ), {!Get_App.UTM_Source_First_Touch_Category__c}, IF( ( ISBLANK( {!Get_App.Source__c} ) && ISBLANK( {!Get_App.UTM_Source_First_Touch_Category__c} ) && !ISBLANK( TEXT( {!Get_App.Referral_Source__c} )) ), TEXT( {!Get_App.Referral_Source__c} ), "Website" ) ) ) ) )
